gurmukhi: ਸੀਸ ਗੁਰ ਚਰਨ ਕਰਨ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ ਦੀਖ੍ਰਯਾ ਲੋਚਨ ਦਰਸ ਅਵਲੋਕ ਸੁਖ ਪਾੲੀਅੈ
transliteration: Sees Gur Charan Karan Oupadays Deekhyaa , Lochan Daras Avalok Soukh Paaeeai ?
translation: O True Guru! be kind and let my head be in the feet of the True Guru, my ears be always attentive to listen to the words divine, my eyes be seeing your glimpse and thus bless me with true happiness.

gurmukhi: ਰਸਨਾ ਸਬਦ ਗੁਰ ਹਸਤ ਸੇਵਾ ਡੰਡੌਤ ਰਿਦੈ ਗੁਰ ਗ੍ਰਯਾਨ ੳੁਨਮਨ ਲਿਵ ਲਾੲੀਅੈ
transliteration: Rasanaa Sabad Gur Hasat Sayvaa Dandaouta , Ridai Gur Gyaan Ounaman Liv Laaeeai ?
translation: O True Guru! be kind and bless me that my tongue may ever repeat and utter the ambrosial words that Guru has blessed me with, the hands may indulge in the service and salutation, the words of wisdom may remain installed in my mind and thus fix my consciou

gurmukhi: ਚਰਨ ਗਵਨ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਪਰਕ੍ਰਮਾ ਲੳੁ ਦਾਸਨ ਦਾਸਾਨ ਮਤਿ ਨਿੰਮ੍ਰਤਾ ਸਮਾੲੀਅੈ
transliteration: Charan Gavan Saadhasangati Parakramaa Lau , Daasan Daasaan Mati Ninmrataa Samaaeeai ?
translation: May my feet advance towards holy Sangat and circumambulate them, and thus absorb my mind in the humility possessed by slaves of the servants.

gurmukhi: ਸੰਤ ਰੇਨ ਮਜਨ ਭਗਤਿ ਭਾੳੁ ਭੋਜਨ ਦੈ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਗੁਰ ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾ ਕੈ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਪੈਜ ਪ੍ਰਗਟਾੲੀਅੈ ॥੬੨੮॥
transliteration: Sant Rayn Majan Bhagati Bhaau Bhojan Dai , Sree Gur Kripaa Kai Praym Paij Pragataaeeai ?628?
translation: O True Guru! enlighten in me the loving respect by Your grace, making me dependent upon those holy and noble souls whose support is Lord's name. Grant me their company and food of loving devotion to survive on.  (628)
